  • Method Details

    • addRoad

      boolean addRoad(String town1, String town2, int weight, String roadName)
      Adds a road with 2 towns and a road name
      Parameters:
      town1 - name of town 1 (lastname, firstname)
      town2 - name of town 2 (lastname, firstname)
      roadName - name of road
      Returns:
      true if the road was added successfully

    • getRoad

      String getRoad(String town1, String town2)
      Returns the name of the road that both towns are connected through
      Parameters:
      town1 - name of town 1 (lastname, firstname)
      town2 - name of town 2 (lastname, firstname)
      Returns:
      name of road if town 1 and town2 are in the same road, returns null if not

    • addTown

      boolean addTown(String v)
      Adds a town to the graph
      Parameters:
      v - the town's name (lastname, firstname)
      Returns:
      true if the town was successfully added, false if not

    • getTown

      Town getTown(String name)
      Gets a town with a given name
      Parameters:
      name - the town's name
      Returns:
      the Town specified by the name, or null if town does not exist

    • containsTown

      boolean containsTown(String v)
      Determines if a town is already in the graph
      Parameters:
      v - the town's name
      Returns:
      true if the town is in the graph, false if not

    • containsRoadConnection

      boolean containsRoadConnection(String town1, String town2)
      Determines if a road is in the graph
      Parameters:
      town1 - name of town 1 (lastname, firstname)
      town2 - name of town 2 (lastname, firstname)
      Returns:
      true if the road is in the graph, false if not

    • allRoads

      ArrayList<String> allRoads()
      Creates an arraylist of all road titles in sorted order by road name
      Returns:
      an arraylist of all road titles in sorted order by road name

    • deleteRoadConnection

      boolean deleteRoadConnection(String town1, String town2, String road)
      Deletes a road from the graph
      Parameters:
      town1 - name of town 1 (lastname, firstname)
      town2 - name of town 2 (lastname, firstname)
      roadName - the road name
      Returns:
      true if the road was successfully deleted, false if not

    • deleteTown

      boolean deleteTown(String v)
      Deletes a town from the graph
      Parameters:
      v - name of town (lastname, firstname)
      Returns:
      true if the town was successfully deleted, false if not

    • allTowns

      ArrayList<String> allTowns()
      Creates an arraylist of all towns in alphabetical order (last name, first name)
      Returns:
      an arraylist of all towns in alphabetical order (last name, first name)

    • getPath

      ArrayList<String> getPath(String town1, String town2)
      Returns the shortest path from town 1 to town 2
      Parameters:
      town1 - name of town 1 (lastname, firstname)
      town2 - name of town 2 (lastname, firstname)
      Returns:
      an Arraylist of roads connecting the two towns together, null if the towns have no path to connect them.
